steps.title: 1. Pre-requisites
steps.text: Gather your legal business documents, business email, and a dedicated phone number that is NOT currently linked to any WhatsApp account.

steps.title: 2. Meta Business Manager
steps.text: Go to business.facebook.com. Ensure you have admin access to the Business Account. This is where Meta verifies your organization's identity.

steps.title: 3. Create a Developer App
steps.text: Access developers.facebook.com > 'My Apps' > 'Create App'. Select 'Business' as the app type to enable the WhatsApp API tools.

steps.title: 4. Enable WhatsApp Product
steps.text: In your App Dashboard, find 'WhatsApp' and click 'Set Up'. Connect it to your verified Meta Business Account.

steps.title: 5. Phone Number Verification
steps.text: Under 'API Setup', click 'Add Phone Number'. Enter the details and choose to receive the verification code via SMS or Voice Call.

steps.title: 6. Handover to Integrator
steps.text: Copy and send me the: 1. Phone Number ID, 2. WhatsApp Business Account ID, and 3. Permanent Access Token.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.text: The client is responsible for message content and compliance with Meta's Commerce Policies. SPAM behavior leads to number banning.
